solution_line_template: So there is a total of {horizontal_pictures} + {haphazard_pictures} = <<{horizontal_pictures}+{haphazard_pictures}={horizontal_and_haphazard_pictures}>>{horizontal_and_haphazard_pictures} pictures hanging either horizontally or haphazardly.

Therefore, there are {total_pictures} - {horizontal_and_haphazard_pictures} = <<{total_pictures}-{horizontal_and_haphazard_pictures}={vertical_pictures}>>{vertical_pictures} pictures hanging vertically.
